course.title: ADM 6301 Multivariate Methods in Management (3 units)
course.desc: Analysis and practice of commonly used multivariate statistical models, their characteristics, advantages, and limitations. Multiple regression analysis, analysis of variance and covariance, principal component analysis, factor analysis, discriminant analysis. Illustration of management problems through practical examples and hands-on experience with large-scale statistical analysis computer packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: ADM 5300 or Permission of instructor required.
